chunks.cleaned_english_translation: In the name of the Lord, begins the martyrology for the year by our holy father Notker, known as the Stammerer, a monk of Saint Gall.
chunks.original_latin:
IN NOMINE DOMINI
INCIPIT
MARTYROLOGIUM
PER ANNI CIRCULUM
S. P. N. NOTKERI, COGNOMENTO BALBULI, MONACHI SANCTI GALLI.
